title: Ep. 52: 'Preacher' Re-up
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald discuss the trailers for 'Sully' (8:24) and 'Bleed for This' (11:16), and dissect AMC’s 'Preacher' (12:20). Later, they intro their new book club (34:55) and offer their opinions on Don DeLillo (37:58). 

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
